title: BRIEF-Celanese Statement On Withdrawal Of European Commission Notification
text: March 19, 2018 / 9:50 PM / Updated 17 minutes ago BRIEF-Celanese Statement On Withdrawal Of European Commission Notification Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Celanese Corp: * CELANESE STATEMENT ON WITHDRAWAL OF EUROPEAN COMMISSION NOTIFICATION * CELANESE CORP - ABANDONING ITS MERGER AGREEMENT WITH BLACKSTONE’S RHODIA ACETOW BUSINESS * CELANESE - CO, BLACKSTONE’S RHODIA ACETOW BUSINESS HAVE WITHDRAWN NOTIFICATION OF PROPOSED JV FROM EUROPEAN COMMISSION * CELANESE SAYS ‍WILL BE REVIEWING STRATEGIC OPTIONS​ * CELANESE - PARTIES WERE UNABLE TO REACH AGREEMENT WITH EUROPEAN COMMISSION ON ACCEPTABLE CONDITIONS TO ALLOW PROPOSED JV TO PROCEED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
